definition: abbr. for Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1]

sentences.english: My favorite is probably the bullet-time rig used in The Matrix.
sentences.chinese: 我最喜欢的可能是黑客帝国中的子弹时刻了。

sentences.english: After hacker attack website is procurable, carry out " hang a horse " .
sentences.chinese: 当黑客攻击网站得手后，便实施“挂马”。

sentences.english: The hackers then follow their marks as they move to their online bank accounts.
sentences.chinese: 黑客就可以根据木马留下的记号跟踪他们的网银账号。

sentences.english: Our home page was attacked by hackers.
sentences.chinese: 我们的主页被黑客攻击了。

sentences.english: After seeing how vulnerable these scripts are to hackings and holes.
sentences.chinese: 在看出这些脚本对黑客和漏洞是多么脆弱之后。

sentences.english: In the meantime, criminal hackers may try to exploit the flaw to commit cybercrimes.
sentences.chinese: 在这个期间，黑客有可能够利用漏洞进行网络犯罪。

sentences.english: There are tens of thousands of Hong Ke, or red visitors, as they are known in China.
sentences.chinese: 在中国，这些数以万计黑客们被称为“红客”。

sentences.english: Do pair of hackers trade on stockjobber net with respect to impregnable ?
sentences.chinese: 证券公司网上交易对黑客就固若金汤？

sentences.english: China also falls victim to hacker attacks.
sentences.chinese: 中国也是黑客攻击的受害者。

sentences.english: This Lifehacker guide demonstrates some of those tips and tricks.
sentences.chinese: 这篇生命黑客指南会有所阐述。

sentences.english: Learn how to harden the major operating systems and develop an understanding of hacking techniques.
sentences.chinese: 学习如何加强主流操作系统和发展对黑客技术的理解。

sentences.english: Hackers have already attacked several European Web sites using the unpatched exploit.
sentences.chinese: 该漏洞尚为被修补，黑客已乘机攻击了数个欧洲网站。

sentences.english: I am a raver, and this is my manifesto.
sentences.chinese: 我是一名黑客，以上是我的宣言。
而黑客无一例外都是爱耍聪明的家伙。

sentences.english: In one move, the hacker has cut off your network from the Internet.
sentences.chinese: 仅仅这一下，黑客就能阻止你连上因特网。

sentences.english: The port scanning also is the hacker collects the goal main engine information one commonly used method.
sentences.chinese: 端口扫描也是黑客搜集目标主机信息的一种常用方法。

definition: "honker", Chinese hacker motivated by patriotism, using one's skills to protect domestic networks and work in national interest
